thread.title: DIRECTV by EnterSource / NewsRadio WGNS Week 7 Awards Presented
thread.title_full: DIRECTV by EnterSource / NewsRadio WGNS Week 7 Awards Presented

title: DIRECTV by EnterSource / NewsRadio WGNS Week 7 Awards Presented
text:
DIRECTV by EnterSource / NewsRadio WGNS Week 7 Awards Presented Published: October 13, 2015 Print L-R: Taeler Dowdy, Andy DeGraw, David Watson 
Blackman's win over Smyrna in week 7 of the prep football season garnered the Blaze the DIRECTV by EnterSource / NewsRadio WGNS "Game of the Week" award. 
Andy DeGraw, Vice President of DIRECTV by EnterSource, presented a plaque to the Blaze Tuesday. 
The game's MVP was running back Taeler Dowdy. He was presented the MVP crystal award after rushing for 190 yards in the win over the Bulldogs and scoring two touchdowns. One of his TD's was 41-yards the other 47-yards. He's the first two-time winner of the MVP award this year.
